Call the `registerComponent()` method once for every custom component type that you use in your app before you use it. # registerComponent()

**Type Method**

Registers a new component type.

## Declaration

```swift
static func registerComponent()
```

## Discussion

Call the `registerComponent()` method once for every custom component type that you use in your app before you use it. You don’t need to call the method for built-in component types, like [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ModelComponent] or [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnchoringComponent].
title: registerComponent()
